title: Sejuani Splash Art Bug
body: Selected Poro Rider Sejuani skin.  In champion loading, it said "Poro Rider Sejuani" but the splash art was the normal Sejuani.  In-game I did have the Poro Rider skin.  Everyone else in my game saw the same incorrect splash art in champ select.

replies.body:
Hey Palaven - 

Is this occurring every game for one, or was it a one time deal?

Haven't been on all day so I just saw your question.  At the time of my original post it had only happened once (I didn't happen to play Sejuani afterwards last night).  Anyhow, when I saw your post just now I figured I test a custom.  And sure enough the bug just occurred for me again in a custom game.  So it appears to be continuous.
Thanks for the additional context! We're looking into it!

It happens for me as well, though I've only noticed it in ARAM, since that's all I've been playing lately.

http://imgur.com/5eDlxV7
